co.paralleluniverse.data.record

Class Records

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.data.record.Records

  • public final class Records
extends Object
    Static utility methods for working with records.

    • Method Summary

      Clears a record.

    • Method Detail

      • delegate

        public static <R> Record<R> delegate(Object owner,
                                     Record<R> record)
        Creates a record object that delegates all operations to the given record.
        Parameters:
        owner - any object that can identify the owner of the newly created record and can be used to restrict modification of the delegate
        record - the record to which operations will be delegated
        Returns:
        a new record object that delegates all operations to the given record.
        See Also:
        setDelegateTarget(Record, Object, Record)

      • setDelegateTarget

        public static <R> void setDelegateTarget(Record<R> record,
                                         Object owner,
                                         Record<R> newDelegate)
        Sets the target record of a record created with delegate().
        Parameters:
        record - the delegate record returned from delegate().
        owner - the owner object passed to delegate().
        newDelegate - the new target

      • getDelegateTarget

        public static <R> Record<R> getDelegateTarget(Record<R> record,
                                              Object owner)
        Returns the target record of a record created with delegate().
        Parameters:
        record - the delegate record returned from delegate().
        owner - the owner object passed to delegate().
        Returns:
        the target of the delegate record

        Copies the contents (all fields) of one record into another, including transient fields.

        target - the target record

        Creates a shallow clone of the given record, optionally not copying transient fields.

        Parameters:

        copyTransients - whether to copy transient fields

      • clear

        public static <R> void clear(Record<R> record)
        Clears a record. Sets all object fields and object array elements to null and all primitive fields and primitive array elements to 0.
        Parameters:
        record - the record

      • clear

        public static <R> void clear(RecordArray<R> recordArray)
        Clears all elements of a RecordArray as in clear(Record).
        Parameters:
        recordArray - the RecordArray

      • deepEquals

        public static <R> boolean deepEquals(Record<R> a,
                                     Record<R> b)
        Perform a deep equals on two records.
        Parameters:
        a - the first record
        b - the second record
        Returns:
        true if all fields of record a are recursively equal to the respective fields of record b.
